mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME(GAME_NO, GAME_DATE, GAME_TIME, TEAM_A, TEAM_B, REG_DATE, GAME_FIELD, SCORE_A, SCORE_B, GAME_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_GAME_NO.NEXTVAL, #{gameDate}, #{gameTime}, #{teamA}, #{teamB}, DEFAULT, #{gameField}, #{scoreA}, #{scoreB}, #{gameStatus})
